organization.description:
The Peace Education Foundation develops the u0022PeaceWorksu0022 curricula (Grades PK-12), educational materials and training program that enable individuals to: resolve conflicts effectively and non-violently; effectively deal with bullying prevention; learn ways to handle frustration and anger; practice conflict resolution strategies; respect human differences; understand the dynamics of conflict; develop positive interpersonal skills; and explore conflict and positive force for change. We also provides training for schools, teachers, parents, youth, professionals, and the workplace. 

Our grade specific u0022PeaceWorksu0022 evidence based curricula (pre-K to high school)is honored to have held u0022Select Programu0022 recognition from The Collaborative for Academic, Social, and Emotional Learning (CASEL) since 2008.
organization.name: PEACE EDUCATION FOUNDATION, INC.
